string_shot.name: String Shot
string_shot.description: The opposing Pok√©mon are bound with silk blown from the user's mouth that harshly lowers the Speed stat.

leech_life.name: Leech Life
leech_life.description: The user drains the target's blood. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.
effects: heals user for 50% of damage dealt

twineedle.name: Twineedle
twineedle.description: The user damages the target twice in succession by jabbing it with two spikes. This may also poison the target.

pin_missile.name: Pin Missile
pin_missile.description: Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.
